# Generated by uv, managed with uv pip install -r requirements.txt

# Core FastAPI WebSocket server

uvicorn[standard]==0.24.0
websockets==12.0

# Voice Processing - Coqui TTS (XTTS v2 model)
coqui-tts>=0.27.0
torch>=2.0.0  # Required for TTS

# Speech Recognition - Vosk Arabic
vosk==0.3.45

# Audio Processing & Utilities
numpy==1.24.3

librosa==0.10.1

# Web Framework & CORS
starlette==0.27.0

# Optional: Advanced audio processing

# Logging & Monitoring
rich==13.7.0
loguru==0.7.2

# File system operations
